message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the representation and classification of textures, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of statistical distributions and the focus on individual and layout attributes suggest a possible connection to machine learning (cs.MM) and graphics (cs.GR). The experiments involve classification and ranking, which are typical tasks in machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
